Retrieve Real-Time Quotes of Available Securities

Collection of functions providing real-time quotes of various securities and cryptocurrencies

Company Summaries

Collection of functions providing various overviews and summaries of public companies

Company Profile

Company Income Statement

fmp_balance_sheet()

Company Balance Sheet

Company Cash Flow

fmp_key_metrics()

Company Key Metrics

Company Financial Ratios

Company Rating

fmp_dcf()

Institutional Funds

API Utilities

Utility functions for connecting to the FMP API

fmp_api_key()

Install a Financial Modeling Prep API Key in Your .Renviron File for Repeated Use
